A toothbrush that tracks your brushing habits and provides personalized feedback on your oral health.
A toothbrush that uses AI to detect cavities and other oral health issues and alert your dentist.
A toothbrush that uses ultrasonic technology to clean teeth and remove plaque more effectively.
A toothbrush that uses a unique bristle design to remove more surface stains and improve the overall appearance of your teeth.
A toothbrush that uses a built-in timer to ensure you brush for the recommended 2 minutes and includes a pressure sensor to prevent too hard brushing.
